Description:
"PURELY MAJESTIC - GRANDVUE ESTATE OFFICER"
Its all about location! Walking distance to shopping precinct, schools, parkland and public transport makes this beautifully presented family home a must see. This elegant residence awaits your inspection.
- Boasting 4 large living areas;
- Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
- Gas log fire,Ducted gas heating, split system air conditioning.
- 4 Double size bedrooms, master complete with Walk in Robe and ensuite, and Study nook.
- Double car garage.
- Good side access for caravan, boat, or extra vehicles.
- Large Block . Approx 680m2. Ideal space for a swimming pool, or extra shedding.
- Outdoor alfresco entertaining area,
Being elevated you will also be spoilt with views over officer and beyond.Why build? This home is well worth an inspection to appreciate whats on offer. You will not be disappointed.

Description:
Top Block in Timbertop!
Be quick to secure this 512m2 block with a great 15m frontage. Live the Timbertop lifestyle!
This up and coming estate has life's conveniences at your door step. From nearby primary and secondary schools, child care, shopping, sports and recreational facilities this area is prime position for the growing family. Enjoy the landscaped parks and walking tracks you'll find everything you need so close to home.
Easy freeway access from and nearby public transport allows for convenient travel to Melbourne's CBD, Fountain Gate Shopping Centre Beaconsfield and Berwick for a variety of specialty stores, cafes, restaurants, schools, TAFE and Monash University.
Jump on this one it won't last! Call today!

Description:
CALLING ALL INVESTORS, FIRST HOME BUYERS AND DOWNSIZERS !
Located close to transport and all other amenities, this two bedroom unit is well presented and ready for sale. The front one of only four on the site, it features a spacious living area, a separate entry, and new paint and carpet throughout. Both bedrooms are of generous proportions whilst the main has semi-ensuite access to the bathroom and multiple BIRs for additional convenience. The kitchen includes an electric oven, gas cooktop and ample cupboard space. The toilet is separate and there is a courtyard to the rear of the property, perfect for a small dog to run around in. A single lock up garage rounds off this affordable package. Call now to discuss your interest.

Description:
Exceptional Family Living on 20 Pristine Acres
Superbly located on the urban fringe is this enticing lifestyle property that offers peace and privacy. Secluded from the roadside by mature plantings and hedges. A gravel drive way leads to a neatly kept residence encompassed by established trees and mature gardens. The residence offers light filled formal and informal living rooms, that capture views of the grounds and beyond to the solar heated inground pool. Offering three generous bedrooms, the master with ensuite , plus study. A country style timber kitchen with hostess appliances is central to the design. That opens to expansive outdoor entertaining area enclosed with café blinds. A three car carport offers undercover access to the residence. Excellent shedding facilities include high clearance 40x30 multipurpose workshop, concrete floored and powered. A Stable block with three stables plus tie up yards and horse wash, plus a three bay machinery shed. In addition there are sundry shedding and stock handling facilities including load race. The property is divided into 8 paddocks with day shelters and side laneway, all with reticulated water. A boutique lifestyle property minutes from Pakenham and Officer.
Insights: 150 Patterson Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
Family Living in Timbertop Officer!!
Located in the brand new Timbertop Estate in Officer, offering easy access to all amenities including Officer Train Station and schools in nearby Officer, Beaconsfield and Berwick is this beautiful family home.
Oozing street appeal with a modern facade, landscaped gardens and attention to detail throughout, this property will appeal to young families, with a large lounge at the front of the home, as well as a separate open plan kitchen, dining and family room for everyday living.
The modern home contains four bedrooms, master with full ensuite & WIR, & BIR's to the remaining bedrooms.
A stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances, freestanding 900mm oven and dishwasher will make catering a delight.
The home also features ducted heating, double garage with remote control, large (548sqm) allotment and huge decked alfresco area, perfect for entertaining friends in all seasons.
The young home has had all of the hard work already done. Simply move in and enjoy this stylish home in this exciting new estate!

Description:
SOLD by Andrea O'Connor 0439 988 714
A perfect choice for an investor or buyer looking for an easy lifestyle, all you need to do is move in to this beautiful nearly new townhouse.
Boasting three bedrooms ~ all situated upstairs, master bedroom is complete with walk in robe, full ensuite and private balcony, bedroom two with walk in robe and bedroom three with double robe, plus a retreat area with split system.
The kitchen is stunning, with stone bench tops, electric oven, gas hot plates and dishwasher. A powder room is also conveniently located downstairs, as well as a spacious laundry. Sitting pretty on a cottage sized block, this townhouse has fantastic low maintenance gardens, including synthetic grass and a mod deck, perfect for the budding hostess. Other great inclusions are an oversized double garage with internal access and a rear gate for easy access. Last but certainly not least, this home is situated in central Officer, close to public transport, schools and shops. Offer now or regret later.

Description:
4 ACRES OF PARKLIKE SERENITY - SUPERB HOME, AMAZING SHEDS & GARDENS.
Nestled into a secluded, semi-rural setting north of the highway offering true peace and tranquility whilst being a moments’ drive from urban services. The property features a contemporary styled four bedroom home with an apron of lush greenery complimenting it to stunning effect. Light filled and north facing, the home exudes character and warmth throughout. Its main sandstone floored living area opens to a superb entertainment terrace and a further semi enclosed alfresco area features a traditional clay pizza oven and BBQ area for large family gatherings. Back inside, the granite benched kitchen features stainless steel appliances, crisp off white cabinetry and plentiful storage. The master suite is segregated from remaining bedrooms, with two of these in a separate ‘wing’ complete with guests or children’s lounge between them. Bathrooms are chic and contemporary and the home boasts top quality ducted refrigerated air conditioning and wonderful gas fired hydronic panel heaters throughout (the Rolls Royce of heating systems). The property is protected by state of the art video surveillance/alarm systems and a stately, stone pillared electric entry gate way. Both mains and tank water service the property and drought tolerant lawns retain a year round rich green appearance. The shedding is something out of the ordinary and includes a 12 x 7.6 workshop and a further 18 x 7.6 machinery shed with toilet/bathroom plus various poultry/bird enclosures that the present owners use for their thriving hobby based enterprise. These improvements could be utilized for a variety of uses but will particularly interest the bird fanciers out there!
Agent’s Note: A property that is fully established, meticulously maintained and a ready for a new owner to benefit from its present owners many years of effort and expense.
Insights: 40 Armytage Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

A Family Entertainer!
From the moment you enter this home, you will realise there is nothing you will need to do except move in, unpack and relax! Located in the peaceful Arcadia estate, this modern 3 year old family home will complete your house hunting.
The home comprises of 4 bedrooms, the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite which is located at the front of the property whilst the other three bedrooms have built in robes. The heart of the home being the kitchen offers the highest of quality, from the Caesar stone benches, dishwasher, to the 900mm stove. The kitchen also overlooks the dining and family room with views to the stunning covered alfresco area making it perfect for entertaining guests.
Other features of the property include ducted heating, solar panels, evaporative cooling, double garage with internal access and a great location! Close to schools, shops, train station and bus services. Inspection is a must!

Description:
Ready For You in Timbertop
Sale by Negotiation
This near-new home in the ever popular Timbertop Estate could be your opportunity to secure your future in what is sure to become one of Officer's most highly sought-after neighbourhoods. Offering a sensible single-level floorplan showcasing four bedrooms, master at the front of the home with walk-in-robe and ensuite, as well as two separate living areas we are sure this home will suit the modern family. At the centre of the home you'll find the well-appointed kitchen which feature stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances and fronts on to the open-plan meals and family areas. The remaining three bedrooms and family bathroom are quietly tucked behind a wide hallway allowing for maximum privacy and accessibility. Outside you'll discover the low-maintenance yard beyond the wonderful alfresco dining area, perfect for the morning coffee or dinner with friends. As one of the few opportunities that have arisen to secure an established home in the Timbertop estate, we're sure this one won't last long. Be sure to call us today to register your interest in the home.
Calum Dabb : 0400 273 535

AMAZING IN ARENA!
TOWNHOME-NO BODY CORP, YOU WILL NOT FIND ANY BETTER.
In a cracking location of Officer's most premium estate is this stunner.
Offering 3 double bedrooms all with cooling & heating, master with ensuite that has an oversize shower, triple stacker built in robes for ample storage, bedrooms 2 & 3 with built in robes and serviced by an additional bathroom and separate toilet. Living space will surprise you with the main downstairs living room spacious and appealing, additional living room/study on the upper level adds further excitement, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, gloss cabinetry, great storage, connects with a great meals/dining space.
Features include full NBN connected and working, separate recycled water taps, low running costs with solar hot water, 6 star energy, double remote garage with internal access, separate laundry, under stair storage, brilliant split system cooling/heating, security doors, select tinted windows, additional powder room down stairs for maximum convenience. Outside the property is fully landscaped for easy care and maintenance, outdoor entertaining is most enjoyable under the gazebo, side gate for storage and fully concreted paths are brilliant.
Arena is Lifestyle, the shopping complex is only 2 minutes away, bike and walking paths at your door, parks, transport, train station and the confidence of this outstanding estate. With the entire estate now sold out this is an opportunity to live the life and capitalise. You must inspect this one!

Description:
The opportunity is Yours!
Alex Scott and Staff are proud to present 16 Bellerive Avenue, Officer. This property is positioned in the highly sought after Arena Estate. With great schools, the Officer Shopping Complex, public transport, walking trails, parks, Cardinia Train Station and easy Freeway access makes this the perfect investment or family home.
The house offers three good sized bedrooms, the master with walk in robe, study nook and en-suite while the two remaining rooms both have built in robes. There is a large open plan living and dining room plus second living room at the front of the house. The kitchen is state of the art with walk in pantry, stone benchtops, double sink, 900mm oven and gas cooktop. For your year round comfort there is ducted gas heating and Foxtel. All this on an easy low maintenance 450m2 block - what more could you want? Currently on lease until 30/8/2016 with a great tenant wishing to stay on making this the perfect investment property. Call Matt Koster today to secure your own private inspection.
Insights: 16 BELLERIVE AVENUE, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2016 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
WOW! Your Future Oasis Awaits!
### UNDER CONTRACT ###
Located precisely 4.9km from the corner of Starling Rd and Princes Hwy, it's absolutely stunning in every way! Just over 20 acres of natural bushland that undoubtedly will be converted into one magical home environment (STCA) and end up being one of the premiere properties for miles. The only piece of the puzzle missing is you!
Complete with its very own creek running through the middle of the property and in the most convenient of locations, you will literally be minutes from the Princes Hwy , shopping centres and public transport into the city.
This has to be the greatest value on offer in Officer, with genuine vendors looking to sell you will need to act fast!
